t: 6:1*r Hebrew; Septuagint four*i hundred*i and*i fortieth*i
6:2*r That is, about 90 feet long, 30 feet wide and 45 feet high or about 27 meters long, 9 meters wide and 14 meters high
6:3*r That is, about 30 feet or about 9 meters; also in verses 16 and 20
6:3*r That is, about 15 feet or about 4.5 meters; also in verses 23-26
6:6*r That is, about 7 1/2 feet or about 2.3 meters; also in verses 10 and 24
6:6*r That is, about 9 feet or about 2.7 meters
6:6*r That is, about 11 feet or about 3.2 meters
6:17*r That is, about 60 feet or about 18 meters
